Great Game. 2nd game to have me play over 1,000 hours. Yes there are bugs, yes the Dev's make mistakes but they are one of the few that activity continue to grow the game and try to improve it. Yes, they do not do everything the people want but they are trying and still plan to. 5 plus years and they have not quit and keep going. I enjoy both killer and Survivor Sadly there are a lot of Toxic players in the game but what game does not.

Give it a 9 out of 10. Great with friends. 

Not a perfect score due to various of random bugs that appear. (hey it happens) Also due to the fact, you can play killer by yourself but survivor by yourself is risky. Game is destroyed and strives on Team play with communication. However, this is also what hurts the game. Take it as you see fit.

I still suggest playing the game and trying it out.

Good game ruined by toxic community. just wrote a long review about the pros and cons of this game and my steam crashed so I'm just going to keep this short Dead By Daylight is a great game with very kind and wonderful developers. The game has a lot of toxic players in fact I myself have not played the game in a year because of this. Whenever you win or lose the kind Dead By Daylight community (Joke) decides to take it to the text chat and type like the keyboard warriors they are like its a mw2 lobby. Though there are ways to counter getting demoralised in the text chat by just turning it off or not paying attention to it. Another thing that I think makes the game not very fun is the 12 year olds who think its fun to camp people on hooks but with recent updates they made it harder for people that camp hooks to play. One thing that I like about Dead By Daylight is that it gets frequent updates that make and change the game for the better (Usually). Another thing that I like about Dead By Daylight is that there are a lot of killers and survivors that you can play even though the survivors are all the same. I forgot to put that when I used to play it took large amounts of time to find a mach regardless of the large player base and when i turned crossplay on or off it did not change, though I'm not sure if it is that way now. I think Dead By Daylight is worth it if you don't mind getting trash talked in the chat or just want a fun game to play with your friends.

Одна из самых забагованных игр, которые вы только сможете найти. 
Каждый новый патч это испытание для ваших нервов, возьмите в привычку проверять целостность файлов после каждой обновы и искать катку по 30-40 минут, чтобы вас положили в первые минуты игры. 
Молитесь всем знакомым и незнакомым богам, чтобы ваши тиммейты не ливали, как только увидели не ту карту, пока вы пытаетесь поиграть в соло, а в игре за мана вас не выкидывало в начале матча. 
Непосредственно плюсы в этой игре тоже есть, но только от эмоций, полученных во время игры в пати, ведь только они спасают и помогают хоть как-то отвлечься от просиживания своей задницы в лобби, где во время поиска матча даже в магазине покопаться нельзя. 
К сожалению, в подобном жанре достойных аналогов еще нет, поэтому если есть желание поубегать от маньяков из Пилы, Кошмара на улице Вязов и прочих, или наоборот повесить на крюк и услышать сексуальных крик Стива Харрингтона, то эта игра для вас

First, I have played this game since 2016 until today. My experienced are 1000+ hrs. and Used to Play in DBD tournament. So, I will review about the mechanic, how to play and some techniques of Dead by Daylight.

This game is an Online Co-op and Horror & Survival at the same time. It will have 5 players in a game which are 4 survivors and 1 killer. The objective is finish 5 generators while be hunted by killer. On the map, there are many pallets for dropping to stun the killer while being chased. If there is only survivor escape, the victory will be on survivor’s side. There are two ways to escape which are open the gate or jump in hatch. For the killer, the only to win is kill all of survivors.

When I play this game, I will almost play with my friends in group of 4 including me. The zest of this game is play with the killer’s mind while juke around the map. When you can survive the hunting, you will feel very satisfied and understand the killer’s mental what he/she is thinking at that time. However, it can make some players furious and irritated because they cannot bear with the pressure. So, I can say that there are benefits more than drawbacks.

Finally, I recommend this game for person who does not ever experienced with this game. It can give fun, pressure, and apprehensiveness. If you play with your friends, I can tell that the chaos will appear on your communication among friends.
I mean It's fun game to play with others.
